name: @kyleplo/elucidate
description: Simple, light syntax highlighter for the web.

scripts.build: npm run build-umd && npm run build-esm
scripts.build-umd: rollup elucidate.js --name elucidate --file build/bundle.umd.js --format umd && uglifyjs -o build/bundle.umd.min.js build/bundle.umd.js
scripts.build-esm: rollup elucidate.js --name elucidate --file build/bundle.esm.js --format esm && uglifyjs -o build/bundle.esm.min.js build/bundle.esm.js
